title: The Australian Government System
creator_contributor_role: Canberra. College of Advanced Education. Media Centre, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Navy

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia. Parliament. House of Representatives
description: Provides a broad description of the Australian Government System. Addresses the legislative arm of government including the Governor General, the Senate and House of Representatives. Overviews the executive arm of Government including the Executive Council. Introduces Departments, Authorities and the Federal Judiciary including both the High Court and Family Court of Australia.
